# Aufgabe

Importieren Sie den Datensatz `mariokart` in R.
Berechnen Sie den mittleren Verkaufspreis (`total_pr`)!

Hinweise:

- Runden Sie auf 1 Dezimalstelle.



</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>
</br>

# Lösung

Pakete starten:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_8a5b8d5d08dc916275c75170a00ad92d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(easystats)
```
:::



Daten importieren:


::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_69b6126dc3c94c03c50456907db865b1'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d_url <- "https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/csv/openintro/mariokart.csv"
d <- data_read(d_url)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_2c5494ac777d5657a6b57c2ff6b3a027'}

```{.r .cell-code}
d  %>% 
  summarise(pr_mean = mean(total_pr))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
   pr_mean
1 49.88049
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='mariokart-mean1_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_592603597bfe7017e6a7d550bfc94a9b'}

:::


**Lösung:** 49.88.
